text: I wouldn't recommend this place. The food isn't very good. Went once and haven't been back. They have different kinds of bacon, which was their speciality but I tried a couple and neither was good. If you're looking for breakfast in the area best to go Niblick close by, or Stoneys or Kerr Cafe.

This place is the yum. I had the burger (with bacon, natch) and fries for lunch. The burger was freshly made, juicy, well seasoned, and cooked to a great doneness for a burger. The Applewood bacon was a delicious topper to this burger. And their fries are crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside, and properly seasoned. A very satisfying meal. 

Service was quick and friendly.
I'm really heartbroken if this place is closed. After Smitty's closed, Canadian Bacon was one of the best places in Ontario to get a perfect breakfast skillet.
